<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Except
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	extent attributable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #444444">
	'
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	s compliance
	with Elekta's Site Planning Criteria, JFK shall be liable for any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	damages
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment caused by (a) defects in construction of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Site or defects
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	in
	positioning
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	of the Equipment at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Site;
	(b) defects arising out of materials or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	parts provided,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	modified
	or designed by JFK with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	respect to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	the Site; (c) negligent
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	intentional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	acts of omission or commission by JFK or
	any of its officers, agents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	physicians
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or employees in
	connection with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">

</FONT>

	Site preparation; or (d) negligent
	operation of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment at the Site.

	and adjust
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
	technical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	fee amounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	then being
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	charged
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	billed by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK for all Gamma Knife
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	procedures
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(i.e.,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	procedures performed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	for
	Medicare
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	patients
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and non-Medicare
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	patients).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	3
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage140"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	As
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	means to permit JFK to perform
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	charity care for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	persons
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	who require Gamma
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Knife
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	procedures,
	who are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	not covered by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Medicare, Medicaid or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	private
	insurance programs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(whether indemnity,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	preferred provider,
	health maintenance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	organization, etc.) and who
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	do not have
	the means
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	pay
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	for
	such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	procedures based upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	state adopted standards of indigency,
	GKF shall waive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the per
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	procedure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	payment
	described
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Paragraph
	7 for one (1) Gamma Knife
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	procedure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	for each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	twenty-five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(25) Gamma
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Knife procedures performed under this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Agreement
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	for which a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	per
	procedure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	payment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	made
	to GKF in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	manner
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	described
	herein.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK shall be solely
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	responsible
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(and
	GKF shall not in any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	manner
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	be or become responsible) to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	determine
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(a) whether any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	person
	described herein requires
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	a Gamma Knife procedure, (b) who shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	receive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	a Gamma Knife
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	procedure hereunder if
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	more
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	(1) person
	described herein requires
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	a Gamma Knife
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	procedure,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and
	(c) whether any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	person
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	meets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	standards of indigency. JFK shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	provide
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	reasonable
	written
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	documentation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	evidencing satisfaction of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	conditions set forth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	herein to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	GKF
	at or prior
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to the time
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	of payment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	order for GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	waive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	per
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	procedure payment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	charity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	care
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	purposes.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Except as set forth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	herein,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	pay
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	to GKF the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	per
	procedure payment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	set forth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Paragraph
	7 for each Gamma Knife procedure regardless of the ability of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the patient to pay
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	for
	such services or the amount of reimbursement or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	payment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	received
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	by JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	for such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	procedure.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	8.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Use
	of
</U>
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Equipment
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	.
	The Equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	may be used by JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	only at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Site and shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	not be removed therefrom.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	assign or sublease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Equipment or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	its rights hereunder
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	without
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the prior
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	written consent of GKF; which consent shall
	not be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	unreasonably
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	withheld or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	delayed.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	No assignment or sublease shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	relieve
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK
	of any of its obligations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	hereunder.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK shall not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	use
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	nor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	permit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	the Equipment
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be used in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	manner
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	nor for any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	purpose
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	for
	which,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	the opinion of Elekta or GKF,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Equipment is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	not designed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	or
	reasonably suitable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #464646">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK shall not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	permit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	liens,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	whether
	voluntary or
</FONT>

	involuntary,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	to attach
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
	the
</FONT>

	Equipment, without
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the prior
</FONT>

	consent of GKF. JFK shall have no
</FONT>

	interest
</FONT>

</FONT>

	the

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	Equipment other than the rights acquired as a lessee hereunder and the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	Equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	shall remain the property of GKF regardless of the manner in which it may be installed or
	attached at the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	Site.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	JFK shall, at GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #4B4B4B">
	'
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	s
	request, affix to the
</FONT>

	Equ
</FONT>

	ipment tag
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	s,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	decals, or plates furnished by GKF, indicating GKF's ownership of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	Equipment.

	Additional
	Covenants of JFK
</U>
	. In addition to the other covenants made by JFK, JFK shall, at its own cost and expense:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Provide
	properly trained professional, technical and
</FONT>

</FONT>

	and

	Equ
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #0A0A0A">
	ipment.

</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Protect
	and hold GKF harmless from and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	against
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	all medical and
	financial responsibility for the diagnosis, treatment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	care
	of JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #4B4B4B">
	'
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	patients.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	Fully
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	comply with all of its obligations under the LGK Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Fully

</FONT>

	/
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	reimburse
	GKF on a prompt basis
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 5.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	From
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	and against any and all damages to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	Equipment (including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	any damages arising out of or related to violations by JFK, its agents,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	officers,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	physicians, employees,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	successors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	and
	assigns of the Service Agreement described in Paragraph
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #0A0A0A">
	16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	hereof),
	together with reasonable attorneys fees incurred by GKF to establish or enforce its right to indemnity hereunder, to the extent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	damages are caused by the negligent or wrongful acts
	or omissions of JFK, its agents,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	officers,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	physicians,
	employees,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	successors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	and assigns. In the event the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	Equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	is destroyed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	rendered
	unusable, this indemnification
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	extend up to (but
	not exceed) the full replacement value of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	Equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	at
	the time
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	its destruction less
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	salvage
	value,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	if any.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	From
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	and against any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	and all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	claims,
	liabilities, obligations, losses, damages, injuries, penalties, actions, costs and expenses (including reasonable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	attorneys'
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	fees) for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	events
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #5E5E5E">
	/
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	or occurrences
	described in Article 7.3 of the LGK Agreement to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	same
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	extent
	that JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	agrees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	to indemnify Elekta thereunder.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	The indemnification obligations
	of JFK under this Paragraph 9(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	exclude
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	claims
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	damages arising
	out
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	or related to GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #4B4B4B">
	'
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	breach of its obligations under the Purchase Agreement,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	Elekta's
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	breach of its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	obligations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	under
	the LGK Agreement, or any defects in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #AEAEAE">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	Site
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	Planning Criteria.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Provide
	reasonable and customary marketing materials (i.e. brochures, announcements, etc.), marketing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	support,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	and an administrative and physician (i.e.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	seminars
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	by
	neurosurgeons
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	radiation therapists to referring physicians,
	etc.) commitment to this clinical service. Not less than ninety
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	(90)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	days
	prior to the First Procedure Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	the commencement
	of each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	succeeding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	twelve
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #0A0A0A">
	12)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	month period during the Term, JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	shall submit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1F1F1F">
	for
	approval to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	GKF a proposed marketing budget and plan for the clinical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	to be supported by the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	Equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	for
	the succeeding twelve (12) month period of the Term. GKF shall not unreasonably withhold, delay or condition its approval of the
	marketing budget and plan, and the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	same shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	be deemed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	approved
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	by GKF unless, within thirty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	(30)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	days
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	after
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	receipt
	thereof, GKF notifies JFK in writing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	its exceptions
	thereto. In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	such event,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	the parties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	promptly confer to resolve such exceptions and any other disagreements related to the marketing
	budget
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #464646">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	Once
	approved, the marketing budget
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	be implemented by JFK in accordance with its terms
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #464646">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	As
	funds are expended by JFK in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	accordance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	with the marketing
	budget and plan, JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	shall submit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	invoices (together with
	documentary evidence
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	supporting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	the invoices) for its expenditures
	and, promptly following the receipt of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	invoices, GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	reimburse JFK for fifty percent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	(50%)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	of the expenditures up to the limit of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	Fifty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	Thousand
	Dollars ($50,000.00) per
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	year.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">

	.

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">

</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">

	represents and warrants that GKF has full power
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	and
</FONT>

	to enter into this Agreement, and that this Agreement does not and will not
</FONT>

	violate
</FONT>

	any
	agreement, contract
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1D1D1D">
	instrument binding upon GKF.

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	11.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
<U>
	Ownership/Title
</U>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #030303">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	It is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	expressly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	understood
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK shall acquire

</FONT>

	right,

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	12.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
<U>
	Cost
</U>
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	of Use of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Equipment

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	.

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	is

	otherwise
</FONT>

	provided
	herein,

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	bear the

	entire
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	cost of using the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	during
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Term of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	this Agreement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	This
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	include, but not be limited to, providing trained professionals, technical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and
	support
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	personnel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and supplies
</FONT>

	to
	properly operate the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Equipment. JFK shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	be fully responsible

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	for all
	acts and

	/
</FONT>

	or omissions of such
</FONT>

	professional,
	technical

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and support
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">

	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	16.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
<U>
	Service
</U>
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Agreement
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	GKF
	warrants
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	that,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	simultaneously with

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	this Agreement, it

	shall
	enter

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	a Service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Agreement
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Elekta (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #3D3D3D">
	&ldquo;Serv
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	ice
	Agreement&rdquo;),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	a copy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	of

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	is

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	attached as Exhibit F
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	LGK Agreement (attached
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	hereto
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	as
	Exhibit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and incorporated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	herein
	by this reference.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Following
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	execution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	thereof
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and subject
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	consent of Elekta, GKF shall assign
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	writing all of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	its
	rights
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	arising
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	under the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Agreement, including the right to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	enforce
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
	provisions thereof directly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	against Elekta.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	By
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	virtue
	of said assignment, GKF shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be relieved
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	of all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	responsibility
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and shall not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	manner
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	be or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	become
	liable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the performance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Agreement
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Elekta or any other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	person.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Notwithstanding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	assignment, GKF shall continue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
	use its best
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	efforts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	cause
	Elekta
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to perform its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	obligations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	under
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Service Agreement in a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	timely manner.
</FONT>
</P>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	17.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Termination
</U>
	.
	If,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	after
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	First
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Procedure Date

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and
	each subsequent
</FONT>

</FONT>

	(12)

	month
	period thereafter,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	as soon as reasonably
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	possible
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	following
	a written
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	has
	not provided GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	continue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to provide
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

	Equipment

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK's
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

</FONT>

	za

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	tion

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

</FONT>

	GKF

	'

	GKF shall have

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK

	less than ninety
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(90)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	days prior to the termination date
	designated in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	GKF's written
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #3D3D3D">
	.
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	GKF's

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

</FONT>

	GKF

	not
	less than
</FONT>

	sixty (60)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	days prior to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	GKF's
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	such event,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
	parties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	shall confer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	attempt
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to resolve
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK's objections.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	If
	the parties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	cannot
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	resolve the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the matter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

	submitted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

</FONT>

	in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

</FONT>

	29(d)

</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	GKF elects
</FONT>

	to terminate this Agreement in the manner provided
	herein,

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK shall
</FONT>

	same

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;JFK
	shall

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Renegotiate

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Purchase
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Equipment from GKF for cash (or other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	immediately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	available
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	funds)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	its then
	fair market
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	value (based
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	upon the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #3D3D3D">
	&ldquo;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in
	use&rdquo;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	value of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Equipment),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	but
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	excluding any value attributable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Site, as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	determined by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	qualified independent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	appraiser or appraisal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	agreed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	upon by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	GKF
	and JFK. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	qualified independent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	appraiser or appraisal
	company (or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	its principals
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	or employees) shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	member
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	of a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	nationally
	recognized
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	appraisal society or association of business appraisers and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	have
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	least five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(5) years
	experience in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	appraisal of Gamma Knife equipment and
	other similar high technology
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	medical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	equipment.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	If
	GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and JFK are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	unable to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	the selection of an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	independent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	appraiser, each shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	name two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	qualified independent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	appraisers (i.e., a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	total
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	four (4) named appraisers),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the name
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	of
	each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	designated independent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	appraiser shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	written in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	black
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	ink
	on a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	blank
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	sheet of white
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	paper
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(i.e., one name on each sheet of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	paper),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	each
	sheet of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	paper
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	shall be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	placed
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	identical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	blank
	white envelope and sealed (i.e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #444444">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	four
	(4) separate envelopes) and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the then
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	serving Chief Executive
	Officer of JFK shall randomly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	pick
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	one of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	envelopes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in the presence
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	a representative of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #444444">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	name of the independent appraiser in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	envelope
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	picked by the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Chief Executive Officer shall serve for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	purposes
	hereof.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Terminate
	this Agreement. If

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	for any claims,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	demands
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	liabilities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	arising out of or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	connection with the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	design, manufacture, possession or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	operation of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

	Events
	of

</FONT>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Default
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	by JFK and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Remedies
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	The occurrence of any one of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	following
	shall constitute an Event of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Default hereunder:

</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;JFK
	fails
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to pay
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	installment
	of semi-monthly procedure payments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	when
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	due pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Paragraph 7. above and such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	default
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	continues
	for a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	thirty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(30)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	days
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	after written
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	notice thereof
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	from GKF or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

	assignee

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	given
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;JFK
	attempts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to remove,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	sell,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

</FONT>

	with

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Equipment

</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;JFK
	shall fail
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	observe or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	material

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	required to be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	observed or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

	by

	JFK

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and

	such

</FONT>

	(30)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	days
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	after written
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	notice thereof to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	GKF;
</FONT>

	however, if
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	breach or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	failure
</FONT>

	reasonably requires more than
</FONT>

	thirty (30)

	days
	to cure, then

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	an Event of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Default

	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	not occur
</FONT>

	if JFK commenced

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	cure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the breach or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	failure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	during the initial thirty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(30)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	day
	period

	and
</FONT>

	diligently pursues the
</FONT>

</FONT>

</FONT>

	reasonably
	possible

</FONT>

	end
	of

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;JFK
	ceases
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	doing business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	as a going concern,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	makes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	an assignment for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the benefit of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	creditors,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	admits in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	writing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	its
	inability to pay its debts
</FONT>

	as they
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	become due, files
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	a
	voluntary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	petition

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	is adjudicated a bankrupt or an insolvent, files a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	petition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	seeking for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	any
	reorganization, arrangement, composition,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	readjustment, liquidation, dissolution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	or
	similar arrangement under any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	present
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	future
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	statute,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	law
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	or regulation
	or

	the

</FONT>

	petition

	against

	it
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	proceeding,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	consents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	or acquiesces

</FONT>

</FONT>

	part

</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	Upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	the
	occurrence
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	of an Event of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	Default,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	may at its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	do
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	any or all of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	following:
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	by notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	to JFK, terminate this Agreement as to the
	Equipment, wherever situated, and for such purposes, enter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	upon the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	Site
	without liability for so
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	doing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	or GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	may
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	cause JFK and JFK hereby agrees to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	return
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	the
	Equipment to GKF at JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #414141">
	'
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	s so
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	le
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	cost and expense; (ii) recover from JFK as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	liquidated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	damages
	for the loss of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	bargain and not as a penalty an amount
	equal to the present value of the unpaid estimated future
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	lease payments to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	be
	made by JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	through
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	end of the Term discounted at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	rate
	of nine percent (9%), which payment shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	become
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	immediately
	due and payable and which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	unpaid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	estimated future
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	payments shall be based on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	the prior twelve
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	12)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	months
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	payments
	with an annual five (5%) percent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	increase;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	or (iii) sell,
	dispose of, hold,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	use
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	lease
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	Equipment, as GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	in its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	sole
	discretion may determine (and GKF shall not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	obligated
	to give preference
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	the sale,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	or other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	disposition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	Equipment over
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	sale,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	or other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	disposition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	of similar equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	then
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	owned or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	leased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	GKF).
	In any event, JFK shall, without further
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	demand,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	pay
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	GKF an amount equal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	all
	sums
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	due
</FONT>

	and
</FONT>

	payable
	under
</FONT>

	Paragraph 7 above for all periods
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	up to

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	including the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	date on which GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	had
	declared this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	Agreement to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	be in default.

	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	the event that GKF elects to

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">

	to
	the immediately preceding paragraph

	.

	GKF shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	use
	its
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	sell
	or relet the Equipment;

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">

	and

</FONT>

	and reasonable attorneys' fees. JFK hereby agrees

	any sale,

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;GKF
	shall fail

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	observed or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	performed

	by GKF hereunder and such failure shall continue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	uncured
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	thirty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(30) days
	after written

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	thereof
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	JFK to GKF;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	however,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	if
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	breach
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or failure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	reasonably
	requires more than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	thirty (30)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	days
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	to
	cure,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	then
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	an Event of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	Default
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	not

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	occur
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	if
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	GKF commenced

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	cure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the breach
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or failure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	during
	the initial thirty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(30)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	day
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	period

	diligently pursues the

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">

	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	end of the initial
</FONT>

	thirty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(30)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	day period;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lender
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	declares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	in default
	under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">

</FONT>

	GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	to
	finance the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment
	(subject
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	to the lapse
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	of all applicable cure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	periods
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	without
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	remedy
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the default by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	GKF);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;GKF
	ceases doing business as a going concern,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	makes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	an assignment
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the benefit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	of creditors, admits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	writing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	its inability to pay its debts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	as
	they
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	become due,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	files a voluntary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	petition
	in bankruptcy, is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	adjudicated a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	bankrupt
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or
	an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	insolvent,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	files a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	petition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	seeking for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	itself
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	reorganization,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	arrangement, composition, readjustment,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	liquidation, dissolution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or similar arrangement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	present
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or future
	statute,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	law
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	regulation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	files
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	an answer
	admitting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the material
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	allegations of a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	petition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	filed against
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	it
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	in
	any such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	proceeding,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	consents to or acquiesces in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	appointment of a trustee, receiver, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	liquidator
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	it
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or of all or any substantial
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	part
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	assets or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	properties,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or it or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	shareholders
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	take
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	any action
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	looking
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	dissolution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or
	liquidation; or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Within
	sixty (60)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	days
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	after the commencement of any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	proceedings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	against GKF seeking
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	reorganization,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	arrangement,
	readjustment,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	liquidation,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	dissolution or similar relief
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	present
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or
	future statute,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	law
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	regulation,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	proceedings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	shall
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	have
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	been dismissed, or if within
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #AFAFAF">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	thirty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(30) days after
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	appointment without GKF&rsquo;s consent or acquiescence of any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	trustee,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	receiver or liquidator of it or of all or any substantial
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	part
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	of its assets and properties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	such
	appointment shall not be vacated.
</FONT>
</P>

	&nbsp;
