<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	occurrence of an Event of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	Default,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	JFK may at its option do any or all of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	following:
</FONT>
	(i)
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	by notice to GKF,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	terminate this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment and, in such event, GKF shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	remove
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	the Equipment at GKF's sole cost and expense or,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	the
	absence of removal by GKF within a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	reasonable period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	time
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	after a written
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	request
	therefor,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	for JFK to remove
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment
	with all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	due
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	care and store
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment at GKF's sole cost and expense; or (ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	to recover
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	from GKF such damages as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	may be realized
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	by
	JFK from the loss of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	bargain
</FONT>
	.
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	GKF
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	any event remain fully
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	liable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	for reasonable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	damages
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	provided by law
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	and for all costs and expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	incurred
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	GKF on account of such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	default, including but
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	limited to,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	all court costs and reasonable attorneys&rsquo;
	fees. However, GKF shall not in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	manner
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	become
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	liable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	JFK for any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	consequential
	damages
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	arising
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	out
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	of
	or resulting from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Event
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	of
	Default.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	rights
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	afforded
	GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	hereunder
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	not
	be deemed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	exclusive,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	but
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	be in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	addition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	any other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	rights
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	remedies provided by law.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Notwithstanding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	foregoing,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	event
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	GKF elects
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	to terminate this Agreement in the manner provided herein
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	as
	a result of an Event of Default, JFK shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	have the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	option
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	purchase the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment from GKF on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	same
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	terms
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	described
	in Paragraph 18(a)(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	above
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	giving
	written
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	to GKF of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	exercise of its option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	not more than thirty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(30)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	days
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	after
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	of the occurrence of the Event of Default. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	purchase
	price for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	be payable by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	GKF in cash
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	not more than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	thirty
	(30)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	days
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	following the exercise of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	option.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #242424">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	22.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
<U>
	Insurance
</U>
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	During
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	the Term of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(and
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	renewal terms)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	GKF shall, at its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	own cost and expense, keep
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	effect
	an all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	risk
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	hazard
	insurance policy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	covering
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment.
	The all risk and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	hazard insurance policy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	for an amount
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	not less than the replacement cost
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment. JFK shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be
	named as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	an additional insured
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	risk
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	hazard insurance policy to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	extent of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	interest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment
	arising
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	under this Agreement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	The all risk and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	hazard
	insurance policy maintained by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	GKF shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	evidenced
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	a certificate of insurance or other reasonable documentation
	which shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be delivered
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	by GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	upon request
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	following
	the commencement of this Agreement and as of each annual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	renewal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	of
	such policy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	during the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Term.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	During
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Term of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Agreement,
	JFK shall, at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	own cost and expense, keep in effect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	public liability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	professional
	liability insurance policies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	concerning
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	operation
	of the Equipment by JFK. Said
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	policies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	the amounts of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	not less
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	than
	$1,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	per
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	occurrence and $5,000,000 annual aggregate.
	GKF shall be named as additional insured party on the insurance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	policies to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	be
	maintained
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	hereunder
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	by JFK. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	policies
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	maintained
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	by
	JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	hereunder
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	shall be evidenced
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	a certificate of insurance or other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	reasonable documentation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	which shall be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	delivered by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	JFK
	to GKF no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	later than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	the First Procedure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	and as of each annual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	renewal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	of
	such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	policies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	during
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Term. As an alternative
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to providing the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	insurance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	policies described herein,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	JFK may
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	protect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	against
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the risks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	covered
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	public liability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	professional
	liability insurance policies through
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	a reasonably funded self-insurance program.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	In
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	event JFK elects
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to provide the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	coverage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	described herein through
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	self-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	insurance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	program, upon the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	commencement of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Term and as of each commencement of each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	twelve
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(12)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	month
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	thereafter,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	JFK shall provide written
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	documentation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	to
	GKF evidencing (a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	establishment and existence of the
	self-insurance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	program,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	reasonable funding of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	self
</FONT>
	-
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	insurance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	program based upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	risks
	described herein
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	and the other risks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	intended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	to
	be covered by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the program,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	and (c) GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #464646">
	'
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	s
	rights as a party entitled to protection from the self-insurance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	program
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the risks

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	described
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">

<A NAME="eolPage150"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment is rendered
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	unusable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	as a result of any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	physical damage to,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	destruction
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	of,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment, JFK shall give to GKF immediate notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	thereof.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	GKF shall determine, within thirty (30) days after
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	date of occurrence of such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	damage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	or
	destruction, whether the Equipment can be repaired. In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	event
	GKF determines
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	the Equipment cannot be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	repaired,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	GKF, at its sole cost and expense, shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	replace the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment
	as soon as reasonably possible based
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	the availability
	of replacement equipment from Elekta and within the limits of Elekta
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #464646">
	'
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	manufacturing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	capabilities. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	replacement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	equipment shall be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	same
	or a similar model (based
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	the models for the Gamma
	Knife
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	units
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	then manufactured by Elekta) as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment subject
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Agreement.
	This
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	shall continue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in
	full
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	force and effect as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	though
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	such
	damage or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	destruction had not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	occurred.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	In
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	event GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	determines
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment can
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be
	repaired,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	GKF shall cause
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	Equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	repaired as soon as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	reasonably
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #242424">
	possible
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	thereafter.
</FONT>
</P>

	Or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	such other addresses as either

	party
	may specify

</FONT>

</FONT>

</FONT>

</FONT>

	by

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">

	addressed.

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	24.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
<U>
	Integration
</U>
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	This Agreement and all Exhibits attached
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	hereto
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	contain
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	full and entire agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	between
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	the parties hereto
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	oral or written understanding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	of any force or effect whatsoever
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	unless
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	expressly
	contained
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	in a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	writing executed subsequent to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	the date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	25.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Waivers
</U>
	.
	To
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	extent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	a party fails or chooses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	not to pursue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	any
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	its remedies under this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	Agreement or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	pursuant
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	applicable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	law,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	such
	failure or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	decision not to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	act shall not prejudice such
	party's rights
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	pursue any of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	those
	remedies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	at any future
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	time
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	and
	shall not constitute a waiver of its rights.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">

	Assignments
</U>
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	This Agreement is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	binding upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	and
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	inure to the benefit of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	permitted successors or assigns of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	respective
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	parties

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	hereto,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	except that neither party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	may
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	assign
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">

	or obligations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	express written consent of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	the other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	(which consent shall not be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	unreasonably withheld
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">

</U>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	not be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	manner unless
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	such
	amendment or alteration is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	a writing signed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	by
	both parties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	GKF agrees to make
	available

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">

</FONT>

</FONT>

	or

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">

	period) to

</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	a subcontractor which is consented
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	to
	by JFK, it being understood
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	that,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	inasmuch
</FONT>

	as
	JFK

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	is
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	this Agreement in reliance on GKF's reputation and expertise,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #131313">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #232323">
	JFK shall
</FONT>

	be the
</FONT>

	sole
</FONT>

	and expertise of the

</FONT>

	delegee, and only through
	a subcontractor which provides that,
</FONT>

	until the
</FONT>

	4)

	years
	following

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	of services

</FONT>

	such subcontract,

	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">

	organization shall
</FONT>

</FONT>

</FONT>

	subcontract,

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	29.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Miscellaneous
	Provisions
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
<U>
	Validity
</U>
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	invalidity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	unenforceability of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	portion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	provision
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Agreement shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	effect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	validity or enforceability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	any other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	portion, nor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	shall
	either
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	party's implied or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	express
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	consent
	to the breach or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	waiver of any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	provision of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Agreement
	constitute a waiver of such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	provision
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	any subsequent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	breach.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Attorneys
	Fees
</U>
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	In the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	event
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	any claim or controversy arising
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	hereunder, the prevailing
	part
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #3B3B3B">
	y
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	claim
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	controversy shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	entitled
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	reasonable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	attorneys'
	fee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	addition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	whatever other relief said
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	would
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	otherwise entitled. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	prevailing
	party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be determined by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	the
	arbitrators
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	an arbitration conducted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Paragraph 29
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(d)
	below
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Force
	Majeure
</U>
	. Failure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to perform by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	either
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	excused
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	event
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	of any delay
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	or
	inability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to perform its duties under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Agreement
	directly or indirectly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	caused
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	conditions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	beyond its reasonable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	control,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	including,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	without
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	limitation, fires, floods,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	earthquakes,
	snow, ice,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	disasters,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	acts of God, accidents,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	riots,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	wars, operation of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	law,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	strikes,
	governmental action or regulations, shortages of labor, fuel,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	power, materials
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	manufacturer delays
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	transportation
	problems.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Notwithstanding the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	foregoing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	,
	all parties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	make
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	good faith efforts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to perform under this Agreement in
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	event of any such circumstance. Further, once such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	event
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	resolved,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the parties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	shall again commence
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	performance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	their respective
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	obligations
	under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Arbitration
</U>
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	An
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #3B3B3B">
	y
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	controversy or
	claim
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	between
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	parties arising
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	out of or relating
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Agreement
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	submitted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	arbitration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	accordance
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the then
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	current Commercial Arbitration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Rules
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the American Arbitration Association,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	arbitration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	conducted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in Washington, D.C.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	The
	award of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	arbitrators shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be
	final
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and binding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	upon the parties hereto
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #3B3B3B">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Judgment upon the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	award issued by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	arbitrators may
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	be entered
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	any court of competent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	jurisdiction.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Confidentiality
</U>
	.
	GKF and JFK shall keep the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	terms
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and conditions of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	Agreement strictly confidential and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	neither party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	shall
	(except as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	required by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	applicable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	law,
	regulation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	legal process,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and
	only after compliance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the remainder
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	this
	paragraph),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	without
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the prior
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	written
	consent of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	party,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	disclose
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	any of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the terms
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and conditions of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	this
	Agreement in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	manner
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	whatsoever,
	and (b) will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	not use
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	of
	the terms
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	and conditions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Agreement in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	manner
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	whatsoever
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	other than in connection
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the performance of their respective obligations hereunder. In the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	event
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	either GKF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	JFK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	is,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #262626">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1C1C1C">
	any
	of its representatives are, requested pursuant to, or required by, applicable law, regulation or legal process to disclose any
	of the terms and conditions of this Agreement, such party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1C1C1C">
	notify
	the other party promptly so that it may seek a protective
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	order
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1C1C1C">
	or
	other appropriate remedy or, in its discretion, waive compliance with the terms of this paragraph. In the event that no protective
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	order or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1C1C1C">
	other remedy is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	obtained,
	or a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1C1C1C">
	party waives compliance with the terms
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1C1C1C">
	this
	paragraph, the party will furnish
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	only
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1C1C1C">
	that portion of
	the terms and conditions of this Agreement which it is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	advised
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1C1C1C">
	by
	counsel is legally required
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1C1C1C">
	will exercise all reasonable
	efforts to obtain reliable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	assurance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1C1C1C">
	that confidential
	treatment will be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	accorded such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #1C1C1C">
	terms and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2F2F2F">
	conditions.
</FONT>
</P>

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage157"></A>
<A NAME="V434650_EX10-8A_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_14"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 10.8a
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ADDENDUM ONE
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	TO LEASE AGREEMENT FOR A GAMMA
	KNIFE UNIT
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 9PT; TEXT-INDENT: 32.6PT">
	This ADDENDUM ONE TO LEASE AGREEMENT
	FOR A GAMMA KNIFE UNIT (this &ldquo;Addendum&rdquo;) is dated on January 9, 2008, but is made effective as of July 1, 2002, between
	The Community Hospital Group, Inc., dba JFK Medical Center, a New Jersey corporation (&ldquo;JFK&rdquo;), and GK Financing, LLC,
	a California limited liability company (&ldquo;GKF&rdquo;).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	RECITALS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 33.6PT">
	WHEREAS,
	on or about December 11, 1996, GKF and JFK executed a Lease Agreement for a Gamma Knife Unit (the &ldquo;Original Lease&rdquo;);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 33.6PT">
	WHEREAS,
	effective July 1, 2002, the parties verbally agreed to modify certain terms of the Original Lease, but inadvertently neglected
	to execute a document memorializing the same; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.8PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.1PT">
	WHEREAS,
	the parties desire to enter into this Addendum in order to memorialize their verbal agreement effective July 1 2002, to modify
	terms of the Original Lease.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.8PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 33.85PT">
	NOW, THEREFORE,
	in consideration of the mutual covenants and agreements set forth herein, and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt
	and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the parties agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	AGREEMENT
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.8PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 33.7PT">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Defined
	Terms. Unless otherwise defined herein, the capitalized terms used herein shall have the same meaning set forth in the Original
	Lease.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.3PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 33.9PT">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Per
	Procedure Payments. In recognition of the decreases in the Medicare reimbursement rates which occurred after the Original Lease
	was entered into, and pursuant to Section 7 of the Original Lease, the per procedure payment for the use of the Equipment shall
	be reduced from the per procedure rate set forth in the Original Lease of Nine Thousand Five Hundred Dollars ($9,500) per procedure,
	to the following amounts:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 106.8PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -33.45PT">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;From
	July I, 2002 through and including December 31, 2002, the per procedure payment payable by JFK to GKF shall be equal to Nine Thousand
	Dollars ($9,000) per procedure.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 106.3PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -33.15PT">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;From
	and after January I, 2003, the per procedure payment payable by JFK to GKF shall be Eight Thousand Five Hundred Dollars ($8,500)
	per procedure.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 8.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.2PT">
	3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Marketing
	Support. The last sentence of Section 9(e) of the Original Lease shall be deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 75.75PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.7PT">
	&ldquo;As
	funds are expended by JFK in accordance with the marketing budget and plan, JFK shall submit invoices (together with documentary
	evidence supporting the invoices) for its expenditures and, promptly following the receipt of such invoices, GK.F shall reimburse
	JFK for fifty percent (50%) of the expenditures up to the GKF limit of One Hundred Thousand Dollars ($100,000) per year.&rdquo;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 75.75PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.7PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage158"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.55PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.45PT">
	4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Full
	Force and Effect. Except as otherwise amended hereby or provided herein, all of the terms and provisions of the Original Lease
	shall remain in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.75PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 33.95PT">
	IN WITNESS
	WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Addendum effective as of the date first written above.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.75PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 33.95PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</TD>

</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 10.8b
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ADDENDUM TWO
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	TO LEASE AGREEMENT FOR A GAMMA KNIFE UNIT
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 41.75PT">
	This ADDENDUM TWO
	TO LEASE AGREEMENT FOR A GAMMA KNIFE UNIT (this &ldquo;Addendum&rdquo;) is dated effective as of January 9, 2008, between The Community
	Hospital Group, Inc., dba JFK Medical Center, a New Jersey corporation (&ldquo;JFK&rdquo;), and GK Financing, LLC, a California
	limited liability company (&ldquo;GKF').
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	RECITALS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.85PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 33.8PT">
	WHEREAS,
	on December 11, 1996, GKF and JFK executed a Lease Agreement for a Gamma Knife Unit (the &ldquo;Original Lease&rdquo;), which lease
	agreement was amended by a certain Addendum One dated effective as of July l, 2002 (such Lease Agreement, as amended by such Addendum
	One, is referred to herein as the &ldquo;Lease&rdquo;); and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.85PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 33.8PT">
	WHEREAS,
	the parties desire to further amend the terms and provisions of the Lease as set forth herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.05PT">
	NOW, THEREFORE,
	in consideration of the mutual covenants and agreements set forth herein, and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt
	and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the parties agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	AGREEMENT
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35.5PT">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
<U>
	Defined
	Terms
</U>
</B>
	. Unless otherwise defined herein, the capitalized terms used herein shall have the same meanings set forth in the
	Lease.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 75.25PT; TEXT-INDENT: -33.6PT">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
<U>
	Extension
	of Lease Term
</U>
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 67.65PT">
	a.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It
	is acknowledged that the First Procedure Date under the Lease was April 25, 2000, and therefore, pursuant to Section 4 of the Lease,
	the initial Term of the Lease will expire at 11:59 p.m. on April 24, 2010.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.9PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 67.85PT">
	b.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
	consideration of the &ldquo;Reload&rdquo; of the cobalt-60 source as described below, the Term of the Lease as set forth in Section
	4 thereof, is hereby extended for an additional five (5) year period (the &ldquo;Extension&rdquo;), which Extension shall commence
	at 12:00 a.m. on April 25, 2010, and shall continue until 11:59 p.m. on April 24, 2015, at which time the Term shall expire.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 67.2PT">
	c.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All
	references in the Lease to the &ldquo;Term&rdquo; shall be deemed to refer to the Term, as extended by the Extension.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.55PT">
	3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
<U>
	Cobalt
	Reload of the Equipment
</U>
</B>
	. Section 15 of the Lease is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 40.45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.05PT">
	&ldquo;15.1
<U>
	Cobalt Reload
</U>
	.
	Subject to the terms and conditions set forth below, (a) GKF, at GKF&rsquo;s cost and expense, shall reload the Equipment with
	new cobalt-60 that meets the manufacturer's radioactivity level specifications (the &ldquo;Reload&rdquo;), which Reload shall be
	performed at the Site and shall include any required installation and rigging; and (b) GKF shall use its commercially reasonable
	efforts to perform the Reload in first quarter 2008, subject to scheduling availability. It is anticipated that the Equipment will
	be unavailable to perform procedures for approximately four (4) weeks due to the Reload process.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 40.45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 34.05PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage160"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 91.3PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 37.5PT">
	&ldquo;15.2
<U>
	JFK Support
</U>
	. In connection with the Reload, JFK, at JFK's cost and expense, shall provide GKF with JFK personnel (including
	JFK's physicists) and services upon request and as required by GKF, among other things, to oversee, supervise and assist with construction
	and compliance with local, state and federal regulatory requirements and with nuclear regulatory compliance issues and the calibration
	of the Equipment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 90.8PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.85PT">
	&ldquo;15.3
<U>
	Permits
</U>
	. Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Reload shall be performed by GKF only after all necessary and appropriate licenses,
	permits, approvals, consents and authorizations, including, without limitation, the proper handling of the cobalt-60 (collectively,
	the &ldquo;Permits&rdquo;), have been obtained by JFK at JFK's sole cost and expense (other than any filing or registration fees
	which shall be paid for by GKF). The timing and procedure for such Reload shall be as mutually agreed upon between the parties.
	Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in this Agreement, GKF makes no representation or warranty to JFK concerning
	the Reload, and GKF shall have no obligation or liability to pay any damages to JFK resulting therefrom, including, without limitation,
	any lost revenues or profits during the period of time that the Equipment is unavailable to perform procedures due to the Reload
	process.&rdquo;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 33.7PT">
	4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
<U>
	Per
	Procedure Payment
</U>
</B>
	. Commencing from and after the first procedure performed using the Equipment following the completion
	of the cobalt-60 Reload, the per procedure payment for the use of the Equipment as set forth in Section 7 of the Lease shall be
	equal to Eight Thousand Dollars ($8,000) per procedure.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 55.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.65PT">
	5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
<U>
	No
	Responsibility for Additional Upgrades or Reloading
</U>
</B>
	. It is understood by the parties that GKF is not responsible for any
	additional upgrades, hardware, cobalt reloading, software changes and/or other modifications to the Equipment, except as expressly
	set forth herein or otherwise agreed upon in writing by JFK and GKF.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 55.95PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.4PT">
	6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
<U>
	Assignment
	by GKF to Subsidiary
</U>
</B>
	. GKF may, at any time, assign all of its rights and obligations under the Lease (as now or hereafter
	amended) to its wholly-owned subsidiary whose obligations thereunder shall be guaranteed by GKF.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 55.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.15PT">
	7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
<U>
	Captions
</U>
</B>
	.
	The captions and paragraph headings used herein are for convenience only and shall not be used in construing or interpreting this
	Addendum Two.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 55.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.15PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage161"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 31PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.35PT">
	8.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
<U>
	Full
	Force and Effect
</U>
</B>
	. Except as amended by this Addendum Two, all of the terms and provisions of the Lease shall remain in
	full force and effect, including, without limitation, the charity care provisions set forth in Section 7 of the Lease.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 30.3PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.5PT">
	IN WITNESS
	WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Addendum Two effective as of the date first written above.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
